dict.acceptation: 真，真正；实在，果真；实际上；事实上；

sent.orig: I really really really relentless fear.
sent.trans: 我真的真的真的狠害怕。

sent.orig: It's just really well written and really well cast and it's really funny.
sent.trans: 影片的剧本和拍摄都很好，真的很有趣。

sent.orig: I didn't feel scared really, I just felt really, really excited about it.
sent.trans: 我并� 有感到害怕，我只是觉得非常非常的兴奋。

sent.orig: Dad and Mum, I really really really miss you!
sent.trans: 爸爸，妈妈！真的，真的，真的很想你们！

sent.orig: Tune into your feelings and see what the issue really is really about.
sent.trans: 沉浸在你自己的感受中并看清这个事件到底是怎样。
